bootstrap_contract_address.description: Bootstrap Contract address to which tokens can be delegated to for bootstrapping TOKEN-NATIVE Pool.

deposit_window.description: Number of seconds for which lockup deposits will be accepted.

incentive_token.description: The token being given as incentive.

init_timestamp.description: Timestamp till when deposits can be made.

lockdrop_incentives.description: Total token lockdrop incentives to be distributed among the users.

withdrawal_window.description: Number of seconds for which lockup withdrawals will be allowed.
